the problem is that many indians struggle to take criticism and instead find faults in others. but the reality is, theres a serious lack of civic sense. just look aroundtrash everywhere, even in beautiful places like kashmir, with beer bottles and plastic ruining the scenery. as a local, its heartbreaking to see this. this isnt about blame its about reflection. people need to stop living in denial and start taking responsibility. just dont litter. simple.

ankit, i just want to take a moment to appreciate the incredible work youre doing! the way you shoot, your editing style, and the way you bring each place to life is absolutely outstanding. every single detail, from the angles you capture to the flow of the story you tell, is so thoughtfully crafted. with every new video, its evident how much effort you put into improving and raising the bar. its truly inspiring to see your content evolve and grow to a whole new level of excellence. you have a unique talent for making viewers feel like theyre right there with you, experiencing the beauty of each location. keep up the amazing workyoure on a phenomenal journey, and i cant wait to see what you create next!
